Meenta β Program

Are you interested in learning what on-demand sequencing looks like? Join our newsletter and we will keep you up to date.

FYI, beta meaning, we need early adaptors, who are willing to handle a few bugs and are open to providing feedback, in exchange for reduced pricing.
